Export.CSP: <md-card> <md-card-content layout="row"> <md-input-container style="margin:5px;" flex=85> <label>Name</label> <input type="text" ng-model="newwidget.Name"> </md-input-container> <md-input-container style="margin:5px;" flex=85> <label>Description</label> <input type="textarea" ng-model="newwidget.Description"> </md-input-container> <md-input-container style="margin:5px;" flex=85> <label>Price</label> <input type="text" ng-model="newwidget.Price"> </md-input-container> <md-input-container style="margin:5px;" flex=85> <label>Quantity</label> <input type="text" ng-model="newwidget.Quantity"> </md-input-container> <md-button ng-click="saveWidget(newwidget)">Save Widget</md-button> </md-card-content> </md-card>
